feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: How to Send Internal Buyer Email Notification on Goods Receipt in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud?
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community,

I am currently working with SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud and have the following requirement:

Requirement:
Send an internal email notification to the buyer when a Goods Receipt (GR) is posted for a Purchase Order.

I have been looking into Situation Handling as a possible solution, but I could not find a clear end-to-end tutorial or best-practice example specifically for:

  • Goods Receipt–based notifications
  • Email notification to the internal buyer

My Questions

  • Is Situation Handling the recommended approach for this use case?
  • Has anyone successfully implemented this and can share steps, screenshots, or documentation links?

Any guidance, experience, or references would be highly appreciated.

Thanks in advance for your support!

Best regards
Viktor

entry.title: S/4HANA Public Cloud - How to retrieve currency code list via API?
entry.content:
Hi,

I'm working on S/4HANA Public Cloud integration and need to retrieve a list of currency codes (like JPY, USD, EUR, etc.) via API.

I found SAP_COM_0114 (Currency Master Data Replication), but it seems to be for outbound replication (push data to external systems), not for reading/getting currency data.

Could you please advise:
1. Which API (OData or SOAP) can I use to GET/READ currency codes?
2. Which Communication Scenario should I use?

Environment: S/4HANA Public Cloud

Thank you in advance!

entry.title: Complaint Handling connection with Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I am currently trying to connect SAP Complaint Handling with an S/4HANA Public Cloud system and wanted to check whether there is an official integration guide or documentation available for this scenario.

So far, I haven’t been able to find any relevant documentation or best practices outlining how this integration should be set up.

Has anyone implemented this integration before, or can point me to official SAP resources, guides, or notes that describe the required configuration?

Thank you very much in advance for your support.

Best regards,
Lukas

entry.title: Can’t bill SD documents of type L2 using billing type IV -Suggest Scope Item
entry.content:
If the business requirement is :

The affiliate company delivers a service to the ordering company while delivering a service to a customer. The affiliate company posts expenses and records time on the service order or repair order. These expenses are transformed into debit memo requests. An intercompany invoice with reference to the debit memo request is created by the delivering company.

 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Project Cost Report does not display actual costs?
entry.content:
Hi SAP experts,

I have posted costs to a WBS element and can see them in the line item report and also in reports as "Projects (Actuals" etc. But I can not see any costs in the Project Cost Report (Fiori ID F2513). I tried to select everything possible, but There are no entries for this project or the WBS element.

Are there any special requirements for seeing costs in this report? Any Customizing? Who knows anything?

Thank you very much for any hint and best regards

Rado

entry.title: Authorisations of Business Partners Roles
entry.content:
We are struggling with the authorizations of Business Partners.

 

Our process:

  1. Creation of a business partner by finance FLN00 or CLU00 by the finance department
  2. Extend the supplier or customer BP data by the business, with multiple addresses, contacts, etc..

 

When using the Manage Supplier Master Data App, we  like to extend the supplier BP data with the role FLN01, so the supplier contains both roles FLN00 (set up/ maintained by Finance department) and FLN01 (maintained by Business). But this is not working. Without  authorizations for the role 000000, we are not able to extend a supplier. NO data can be extended, like contacts.

With the 000000 role users can change with the supplier/ customer  master data app also change financial data like bank accounts etc.. They are not allowed to do this. In our governance only people from finance department are allowed to maintain this data.

 

Can  you advise us how we can use the supplier and customer master data apps without giving the role 000000 in te authorization?

Added units of measure in dev100. (Also created new ISO)

Please explain why this error occurs and how to resolve it.

Best Regards

entry.title: how to change Gl accounts for journal entry type
entry.content:
Hello experts ,

Current Situation:

  • For free sales orders (Item Category CBXN) in company code 33xx Q-system , the offset posting for the sales value (Item 2) currently uses account 51301xxxx and functional area 606x
  • In company code 10xx, the same posting uses account 51001xxx and functional area 60xx.

 

Requirement:

For company code 33xx, apply the same logic as in 10xx:

how can we achieve it what happens when we change this settings how to chnage it sap public cloud this scenario .

any links would be great help

entry.title: Third Party Sales of Service with attachment
entry.content:
Hi,

My customer has the following scenario:

Customer is buying a service that is provided by a third party. In general, the service will be invoiced monthly during a year.

They want to bill their customer the amount that is being invoiced by the third party on the supplier invoice. (Basically a bill-through scenario)
They would also like to automatically add the supplier invoice as an attachment in the billing document output.

Is this doable and how would you approach this?

Many thanks,
Jakob

entry.title: How do you integrate SAP Commerce cloud with S4 HANA API for Synchronous Price calls
entry.content:
Hi Team,

Can you help out in sharing the detailed Integration configuration process involved for SAP Commerce cloud to access S4 HANA via API calls.

Taking example of Synchronous Pricing, where API (SAP Sales Order Simulate API for SAP S/4HANA cloud, public edition) is used, there is not much details on integration configuration to be established in Comemrce and HANA side.

https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_COMMERCE_INTEGRATIONS/47ad58c1a27447949aad8addbee46fca/25ed7c0fd8904a38b3bb2001d0de96e1.html

Some of my queries:

1. What needs to be configured for Destination Taget in BO,

2. Is there any Test API's that are available for integration testing purpose

3. Steps for configuring Client certificates in Commerce and HANA.

Also, Is there any SAP blog/learning tutorial that details on the steps invovled for this Integration. 

Thanks,

entry.title: PM order and assignment to WBS element - possibilities
entry.content:
Hello SAP experts,

I have a question about assigning WBS elements to maintenance orders in S4 Public Cloud.

In the organizational data for a PM order, there are two fields where you can assign a WBS element: “WBS Element” in the “Account Assignment” section and “Planning WBS Element” in the “Organization” section.

What are these assignments for? How can they be used?

I only found one place in Scope Item 4VT (Improvement Maintenance) where you create a project in the preparatory steps (3.5) and then assign it to the maintenance order at creation (5.1). But no other processes are shown there.

- What do you do with this assignment?

- Is it possible to assign multiple maintenance orders to a PSP element and track the costs centrally?

- If this assignment has a purpose and a function, is there a documented process/specific scope item and/or test script where examples can be found?

Thank you in advance for any help. Best regards,

Rado

entry.title: 1099 Reporting - Analytics Icon
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I have generated the 1099 forms but I noticed the "Analytics" icon to drill down into the report is missing.

From a demo script that I saw it seems to have the analytics icon.

Thanks

entry.title: BOM Approval - Public cloud
entry.content:
Hi Friends!

We have received a requirement from an SAP Public Cloud customer for BOM creation and release approvals. As we are aware, this requirement is typically addressed using SAP Engineering Change Management (ECM).

However, in SAP Public Cloud, the configuration options related to BOM change history and ECM are not available (please advise if our understanding is incorrect).

Considering these limitations, we kindly request your guidance on the possible options available in SAP Public Cloud to achieve BOM creation and change approvals. Workaround approaches are also welcome.

We have found a few previous answers and references, but most of them apply to SAP On-Premise or Private Cloud solutions.

 

Best Regards,

Udara Samaraweera

SAP Consultant

entry.title: Manage Workforce App Limitations When Integrating Employees from SAP SuccessFactors
entry.content:
Dear Expert.

We are reviewing the employee information interface between SAP SuccessFactors and SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud.
According to Note DIGITS, it is mentioned that if the following communication scenarios are active, the “Manage Workforce” app cannot be used to create employees in certain cases :

  • SAP_COM_0001 (JB1)

  • SAP_COM_0301 (Replicate Basic Master Data for Workforce from External HR Systems)

  • SAP_COM_0575, SAP_COM_0594, SAP_COM_0659 (Master Data Integration)

We would like to verify the technical limitations of the Manage Workforce app when receiving employees from SuccessFactors.

  1. Is it possible to create users directly in Public Cloud independently of the users received via interface?

  2. If the employees received via interface do not have bank information, can this information be added or updated afterward?

 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: transfer or rehire employment situation is not available in API
entry.content:
Hi Team,

We have used API integration for replicating worker profile from third party HR tool to SAP grow system.

we were able to successfully replicate user profile but when one users is transferred from one country to other we dont have any option or filed in API to capture those.

Kindly help with fix for this sitution.

CB USERNAME 

Thanks,

Shahana.


--- Steps to Reproduce ---

Hi Team,

We have used API integration for replicating worker profile from third party HR tool to SAP grow system.

we were able to successfully replicate user profile but when one users is transferred from one country to other we dont have any option or filed in API to capture those.

Kindly help with fix for this situation.

entry.title: Clarification on Differences Between SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Demo Systems
entry.content:
We are currently evaluating SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition demo systems and would like to understand the differences between the following two options: https://www.sap.com/products/erp/s4hana.html#security

 

 

  1. Cloud test, demo, and development – one-system landscape

    • Is it possible to create and manage users and business roles in this system?

    • Are there any limitations regarding the number of users?

    • The offering mentions an Entitlements Package – what exactly does this include, and are there any functional or user limitations?

  2. Cloud test, demo, and development – three-system landscape

    • What are the key functional differences compared to the one-system landscape?

    • Why is a minimum of 100 FUE required?

    • Are there differences in user/role management or system separation (DEV/TEST/PROD)?

Our objective is to use the demo system for realistic user, role, and authorization modeling.

Thank you for your clarification.

Kind regards,
Rudi

Thanks in advance for your help.

Benjamin.

entry.title: JSON Payload Download Implementation in RAP Application
entry.content:
Hello Expert,

I am currently working on a custom RAP (RESTful ABAP Programming Model) Application in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud. In this application, we use an API to send data to an external portal.

Now there is a new requirement when the user clicks a button, the JSON payload that is used in the ABAP program for sending data via the API should be downloaded in JSON format.

For this purpose, I have already created a custom action in the Behavior Definition, and the button is visible in the Application. My question is how to implement the download functionality so that the same JSON payload used for the API call can be downloaded by the user in JSON format and Also, please explain how to implement the JSON download functionality in the RAP application with step by step guidance.

Thank you,
